name: 傅子恒
objective: This course provides the fundamental knowledge, the structure and the designing methods of interactive game programming using Unity3D and C#. Students will learn how to split a game system into modular components and realize the whole system step by step.
schedule:
W01 Unity3D Introduction
W02 UGUI
W03 MVC - View
W04 MVC - Model
W05 MVC - Controller
W06 Example - App I
W07 Example - Mini Game I
W08 Example - Mini Game II
W09 Midterm presentation
W10 Game Design Pattern I
W11 Game Design Pattern II
W12 Game Design Pattern III
W13 Game AI I
W14 Game AI II
W15 Example - Stretegy Game I
W16 Example - Stretegy Game II
W17 Final Project Demo I
W18 Final Project Demo II
